tool_description: An API showing a list of fun facts from various websites
name: Fun Facts
title: Fun Facts

api_list.name: Get Individual Source Fun Facts
api_list.description: Get fun facts from an individual fun fact source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fun-facts.p.rapidapi.com/funfacts/buzzfeed"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fun-facts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fun-facts.p.rapidapi.com/funfacts/{funfactid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fun-facts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Fun Facts
api_list.description:
Returns back a list of fun facts from 3 websites:
goodtoknow
buzzfeed
parade
